Massive storage for your Cloud.

GlusterFS is a networked, scalable filesystem capable of handling thousands of users

Scalable

72 brontobytes likely won't be enough for everyone, but it should do for a while. GlusterFS serves thousands of clients without a hitch.

How big is your need? »

Compatible

Supports standard clients running standard applications over any standard IP network - using common off-the-shelf hardware.

Technical details »

Affordable

Use commodity hardware off the shelf. GlusterFS runs on 64-bit x86 Linux,
